GS4 Calendar

7
MokiePrime
Friday, January 26th, 2018, 12:15:59 PM

Howdy folks! I made a thing! I got tired of looking at the official calendar, with its too small font, colors you can barely tell apart, the I -didn't-know-this-was-here filter, and cut off event titles. So I made one that's better. It doesn't do anything fancy, it just displays the same info as the official calendar in a nicer and, I hope, in a much more user friendly way. I did incorporate the Elanthian month and day names, largely because I always forget them so now I have a calendar and cheatsheet in one. I hope you enjoy!

http://gs4calendar.surge.sh/
